entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
